Room.Name: Kista Post Office
Room.ShortDescription: You are in one of the modern wonders of the world. An efficient post office.
Room.LongDescription: The researchers on the Althemanian Campus who study mental telepathy have devised a most interesting method of delivering messages to the citizens of the land. Simply type sendmail <person> and you can then send a message. (Be sure to hit the Enter key at the end of each line, as there is no word- wrap.) When you are finished, hit the Enter key twice. If you are here to receive mail, type readmail.
